About

WORDPEST.COM

Wordpest is a demonstration site that I've put together to showcase a few of my skills.

Contact me at tdt (at) wordpest dot com for more information about me and the writing or technical services that I can provide for you and your publication, project, or company.

Content Writer

As a content writer, my goal is to provide interesting, informative content that's designed to catch eyes and draw readers to a website or print publication. Much of what I do is ghostwriting, and I enjoy my work!

My topic areas of interest include law, medicine, science, technology, and tech culture.

Technologist

I'm a knowledgable computer user and experienced Linux system administrator. I build web servers for fun, sometimes, and have been known to self-host material using a Linux (Debian, usually), Apache, MySQL, and PHP (LAMP) stack, either on my own hardware or on a virtual host. I occasionally program using Python, and enjoy using single-board computers such as the Raspberry Pi and the CHIP. I'm also active in the local Linux community.

This website is hosted via Github Pages and Jekyll. The layout is based on a theme called Safarnama that I've modified into something more my own using HTML, CSS, and the Liquid template language.

Scientist

I hold a Bachelor of Science in Neurobiology, Physiology, and Behavior with a minor in Insect Biology from The University of California at Davis (2014), during which time I assisted in a project studying the Quantitative Analysis of Reflected Light from Zebra Coats. I performed data analysis for this project using Matlab.
